display_gui()¶

Displays a GUI in the terminal, handling chat history and user input Handles color coordination of client, server, and error messages

handle_key_exchange(addr, message)¶

Handles the key exchange with the client :param addr: Address of client that wants to exchange :param message: Encrypted data of RSA key

Handle incoming messages from clients

start()¶

verify_and_decrypt_message(data, aes_key)¶

Verifies the HMAC and decrypts the message :param data: The packet sent by a client :param aes_key: Key used to decrypt AES encrypted message :return: Decrypted message (plaintext)

Creates a new instance of the server using default arguments Starts the server application
